ESUADZE 11 Ebɛn Kwan Do Na Yenya Nyankopɔn Ne Mbra Do Mfaso? 1. Ebɛnadze ntsi na nyimpa hia akwankyerɛ? Hɛn Bɔfo no nyim nyansa sen hɛn koraa. Tse dɛ Egya bi a ɔwɔ ɔdɔ no, hɛn Bɔfo no dwen hɛn ho. Bio so, ɔammbɔ hɛn dɛ yɛntwe hɛn ho mfi no ho na yɛnyɛ dza yɛpɛ wɔ hɛn asetsena mu. (Jeremiah 10:23) Dɛ mbrɛ mbofra hia akwankyerɛ fi hɔn awofo hɔ no, dɛmara so na hɛn nyina hia Nyankopɔn n’akwankyerɛ. (Isaiah 48:17, 18) Akwankyerɛ a yenya fi Bible no mu no yɛ akyɛdze a ofi Nyankopɔn nkyɛn. Jehovah ne 
..........
yiewiei nkwa. Mbra a otsĩa ebien no botum aboa hɛn ma yɛnye nkorɔfo aatsena wɔ asomdwee mu. (1 Corinthfo 13:4-7) Dɛm mbra yi a yɛdze bedzi dwuma no hwehwɛ dɛ yebosũasua kwan a Nyankopɔn nye nkorɔfo dzi no. 4. Ebɛn kwan do na yenya Nyankopɔn ne mbra do mfaso? Nyankopɔn ne mbra kyerɛkyerɛ mbusua mbrɛ wobotum dze koryɛ atsena wɔ ɔdɔ mu. (Colossaefo 3:12-14) Nyankopɔn n’Asɛm san so kyerɛkyerɛ nokwasɛm a ɔbɔ mbusua ho ban, a ɔnye dɛ, awar yɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔtsena hɔ daa. Yebotum abɔ hɛn honam afamu eyied

TILE 12 Bɔ Ɛbɛla Mɔɔ Sɔ Nyamenle Anye Kɛzi ɛbahola wɔayɛ Nyamenle agɔnwo ɛ? Adenle boni azo a Seetan ɛzonledolɛ ne fane ɛ nwo a? Nyɛleɛ boni a Gyihova kyi a? Kɛzi ɛbahola wɔabɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ sɔ Nyamenle anye ɛ? 1, 2. Bobɔ menli mɔɔ Gyihova vale bɛ agɔnwolɛ kpalɛ la bie mɔ aluma. NWANE a ɛbahulo kɛ ɛkɛva ye agɔnwolɛ a? Ɔda ali wienyi kɛ ɛbahulo kɛ ɛkɛva awie mɔɔ ɔ nee wɔ adwenle, wɔ ngyinlazo, nee ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛkulo le ko la agɔnwolɛ. Na ɛ nye balie awie mɔɔ lɛ subane kpalɛ mɔɔ le kɛ nɔhalɛlilɛ nee at
..........
 wɔ nɔhalɛ mɔɔ yɛdi yɛamaa Nyamenle anwo la ɛnvane Dwobu angomekye anwo. Ɔfane ɛdawɔ noko ɛ nwo. Ɛhye da ali wɔ Mrɛlɛbulɛ 27:11 ne anu, ɛleka mɔɔ Gyihova Edwɛkɛ ne ka ye kɛ: “Me ra nrenya, nwu nrɛlɛbɛ na maa me nye ɛlie, amaa saa awie ka me nwo edwɛkɛ a meahola ye bua.” Edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle la ɛnee Dwobu ɛwu dɛbadɛba la kile kɛ Seetan a le awie titile mɔɔ ka Nyamenle anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane na ɔto Ye azonvolɛ ɛzonle a. Saa yɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ sɔ Gyihova anye a, yɛmaa ɔnyia edwɛkɛ ɔbua Seetan na ɔlua ɛh

LDS Media Player (Oyikyerɛ) Deɛn akadeɛ na ɛhia ansana woatumi de LDS Media Player no ahwɛ oyikyerɛ yi? Ɛwɔ sɛ wonya internet browser a ɛdidi soɔ yi mu baako ne Flash deɛ no bi wɔ wo kɔmputa no so. Kae sɛ: Sɛ wo Flash no taa gyinagyina a, dum flash hadware acceleration no. Wei bɛma agyinagyina no agyae na ama oyikyerɛ no asan atoa so ayi. Bɔ mmɔden hwɛ nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛfa sɛdeɛ wobɛyɛ wei ho. Hunu sɛ: Ɔhaw kakra wɔ Flash version10.1.85.3. no ho. Sɛ wonntumi mmfa LDS Media Player no nnhwɛ a, bɔ m
..........
nkyerɛ no na wode ato wo e-mail nkratoɔ anaa web page so. Deɛn na “Gye Code” no yɛ? Gye Code no ma ho kwan ma wotwe HTML code no a ɛwɔ player no so no na wode to wo web page so. Wobɛtumi de saa kwan yi so ama LDS Media Player abɛka wo web page ho. LDS Media Player no ma kɔkɔbɔ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ wonya Flash Player foforɔ. Kwan bɛn so na mɛyɛ foforɔ? Media player no bɛkyerɛ asɛm bi a ɛte sɛ wei: Wobɛtumi amia nkransɛm no so anya Flash Player foforɔ paa ara afiri Adobe. LDS Media Player no mma yie

Koo Nimo (a wɔsan frɛ no Daniel Amponsah, wɔ mmere a ɔwɔ Britain man mu no) yɛ ɔdehye esan sɛ ne nuabea waree ɔhene. Ahenfie na osuaa sɛnea wɔbɔ kete nnonnoo. Ansa odii mfe du-nkron nsan sɛ ne nuabea waree ɔhene. Ahenfie na osuaa sɛnea wɔbɔ kete nnonnoo. Ansa odii mfe du-na kosnnwom tew ne ho fi abibiman tebea ho. Ɛdeɛn na Yɛyɛ wɔ Ahennie Asa So? Hwɛ video yi na wobɛhu. SUA PII NSƐM A NKURƆFO TAA BISA Adɛn Nti na Yehowa Adansefo Frɛ Baabi a Wohyia no Ahenni Asa? Kenkan na hu baabi a edin “Yehowa Adansefo Ahenni Asa” no fi ne nea enti a yɛfrɛ hɔ saa. HENANOM NA WƆREYƐ YEHOWA APƐDE NNƐ? Yehowa Adansefo Ahenni Asa—Dɛn Nti na Yesisi, na Yɛyɛ Dɛn Tumi Sisi? Dɛn nti na yesisi Ahenni Asa, na yɛyɛ dɛn tumi sisi? Sua sɛnea saa adan a ɛnyɛ konkuronn yi boa asafo ahorow no ho ade pii. ASƐMPA A EFI ONYANKOPƆN HƆ! Dɛn Nti na Onyankopɔn Wɔ Ahyehyɛde? Bible ma yehu nea enti a wɔahyehyɛ nokware Kristofo sɛ kuw, ne sɛnea wɔahyehyɛ wɔn.

MMOA A WƆDE MA ABUSUA NO | MMƆFRA NTETEEƐ Wo ba di atorɔ? ƆHAW NO Fa no sɛ wowɔ dan mu ɛnna wo ba a wadi mfie nnum redi agorɔ wɔ ɛdan foforɔ mu. Prɛko pɛ na wotee sɛ biribi abɔ. Enti wotuu mmirika kɔhwɛɛ wo ba no, na wohunuu sɛ glass a nhwiren hyem no abɔ ɛnna wo ba no gyina ho. Wo ara wohwɛ n’anim a wohunu sɛ ɔno ara na ɛbɔɔ no. Wohwɛɛ n’anim bisaa no sɛ, “Hɛ, wo na wobɔɔ glass no?” W’ano ansi koraa na ɔyii ano sɛ, “Dabi! Mama ɛnyɛ mea!” Ɛnyɛ wei ne berɛ a ɛdi kan a wo ba a wadi mfie nnum no ad
..........
 tirim keka nsɛm kyerɛ ne nnamfo a, ɛbɛtumi aba sɛ ɔyɛ akwadaa nti ɔnnim deɛ ɔrekeka. Sɛ wobɛtumi aboa wo ba paa a, gye sɛ wohunu deɛ enti a ɔtwa atorɔ. Ɛtɔ da a mmisa no asɛm, ka deɛ woahunu. Wo deɛ san hwɛ asɛm a yɛkaa no ahyɛaseɛ no. Maame no ara nim sɛ ne ba no na ɛbɔɔ glass no nso ɔbisaa no sɛ: “Hɛ, wo na wobɔɔ glass no?” Akwadaa no anka nokorɛ; ebia na ɔsuro sɛ ne maame bɛhwe no. Mmom deɛ anka ɛsɛ sɛ maame no ka ne sɛ: “Oo woabɔ glass no!” Sɛ maame no ammisa no, ɛnna ɔkaa deɛ wayɛ no kyerɛ

Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Sukuu atitire baako a ewo ho ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Nko animu Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wo ho.

MMABUN BISA SƐ Adɛn Nti na Ɛsɛ sɛ Meboa Afoforɔ? Nneɛma mmienu bi a nnipa pii nnim Mmabunu a wɔdwene nnipa ho Mɛyɛ dɛn aboa nkurɔfoɔ? Nneɛma mmienu bi a nnipa pii nnim Nea ɛdi kan: Sɛ woboa nkurɔfoɔ a, nkurɔfoɔ nso boa wo! Sɛ woboa nkurɔfoɔ a, obiara bɛhunu. Enti wo nso, nkurɔfoɔ bɛboa wo. Bible ka sɛ: “Monkɔ so mma na nkurɔfoɔ ama mo. . . . Susukoraa a mode susu ma nkurɔfoɔ no, ɛno ara na wɔde bɛsusu ama mo.” —Luka 6: 38. “Deɛ wode yɛ nkurɔfoɔ no, ɛno ara na nkurɔfoɔ de bɛyɛ wo.” —Luka 6: 38, C
..........
sɛ me sika no nnuru ho baabiara. Berɛ a meyii me yam kyɛɛ wɔn adeɛ no, ɛmaa m’ani gyee paa.” —Holly. Wonim? Yehowa Adansefoɔ mmabunu pii de Bible kyerɛkyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ. Dɛn ne “dua koro” no a wɔde dii dwuma wɔ Yesu bere so? “Stauros” wɔ Apam foforo no mu kyerɛ dua biako a wɔde si fam na biako bom wɔ natifi sɛ mmeamudua ma onya sɛso te sɛ‘Ƭ’. Afei nso, wammɔ yɛn sɛ yɛntwe yɛn ho mfi ne ho na yɛnyɛ nea yɛpɛ. (Yeremia 10:23) Enti sɛnea abofra kumaa hia n’awofo akwankyerɛ no, saa ara na yɛn nyinaa hia Onyankopɔn akwankyerɛ. Ɛka a Mobɔ no, Moyɛ Dɛn Nya Sika Tua? Ɛka a yɛbɔ wɔ asɛnka adwuma ho no, yɛn Yehowa Adansefo no ara na yefi yɛn pɛ mu tua ne kɛse. Yɛkɔ yɛn asafo nhyiam a, yennyigye sika wɔ ase na yentua ntotoso dudu. (Mateo 10: Ade biako a ɛmma yɛmmɔ ka pii ne sɛ yenni asɔfo a yetua wɔn ka. Afei nso, Adansefo a wɔkɔ afie afie kɔka asɛm no, yentua wɔn ka, na mmeae a yehyiam no nso nyɛ kuntann. Ntoboa a wɔde kɔ Yehowa Adansefo adwumayɛbea ahorow no, nea yɛde yɛ ni: Yɛde bi boa wɔn a atoyerɛnkyɛm ato wɔn; yɛde bi nso boa asɛmpatrɛwfo ne asafo mpanyimfo bi a wɔkɔsrasra asafo ahorow no; yɛde bi sisi adan a yehyiam som; yɛde bi nso tintim Bible ne Kristofo nhoma kɔma asafo ahorow no. Sɛ obi yi sika de boa a, otumi kyerɛ nea wɔmfa nyɛ; obetumi akyerɛ sɛ wɔmfa ntua asafo a ɔwom no ho ka, anaasɛ wɔmfa mmoa wiase nyinaa adwuma no, anaa mmienu no nyinaa. Sɛ bosome wu a, asafo biara de to gua ma obiara hu asafo no sikasɛm.

Saa Esiane Si A Bɛboa Ɔ? Ɛhɛe, Gyihova Alasevolɛ ta boa menli mɔɔ esiane kɛdo bɛ la. Yɛfa ninyɛne yɛmaa Alasevolɛ nee menli mɔɔ ɛnle Alasevolɛ mɔɔ esiane kɛdo bɛ la. Ɔluakɛ Baebolo ne ka ye wɔ Galeehyeama 6:10 kɛ: “Kenle biala mɔɔ mekɛ kɛra kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ nyele la, bɛmaa yɛyɛ yɛmaa awie biala, bɔbɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yɛ nee bɛ yɛ muala yɛlɛ diedi ko la.” Eza yɛboa bɛ wɔ sunsum nu na yɛkyekye bɛ rɛle.—2 Kɔlentema 1:3, 4. Ngyehyɛleɛ Saa esiane si a, mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ asafo mɔɔ wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ esiane ne kɛzi l
..........

(1 Kɔlentema 16:1-4) Gyihova Alasevolɛ ɔfese ne mɔɔ wɔ maanle ne anu la kpa Esiane Nwo Moalɛ Kɔmatii na bɛnea bɛyɛ ngyehyɛleɛ bɛfa bɛdi menli mɔɔ esiane ɛdo bɛ la ngyianlɛ nwo gyima. Ma wɔn a esiane me haw nti wɔatɔ wɔn no, nsan wɔn akyi na wongu wɔn anim ase. 3 Ma wɔn a wodi me ho fɛw no mfa wɔn nkogu so mma wɔn koma ntu. 4 Ma wɔn a wɔba wo nkyɛn no ani nnye na wɔn ho nsɛpɛw wɔn. ADESUA 1 Dɛn Ne Asɛmpa No? 1. Dɛn ne asɛm a efi Onyankopɔn hɔ no? Onyankopɔn pɛ sɛ nnipa ani gye wɔ asase so. Ɔdɔ a ɔwɔ ma nnipa nti na ɔbɔɔ asase ne biribiara a ɛwɔ so. Ɛrenkyɛ koraa, ɔbɛkeka ne ho ma nnipa a wɔwɔ asase so baabiara anya asetena pa daakye. Obeyi nneɛma a ɛde amanehunu ba afi hɔ ama nnipa.—Kenkan Yeremia 29:11. Nniso biara nni hɔ a atumi ayi awudisɛm, yare, anaa owu afi hɔ da. Nanso, asɛmpa bi wɔ hɔ. Onyankopɔn beyi nnipa nniso nyinaa afi hɔ na ɔde n’ankasa nniso abesi ananmu nna
..........
ankopɔn Asɛm no hyɛɛ nneɛma a ɛrehaw nnipa nnɛ no ho nkɔm. Nneɛma bɔne a ɛrekɔ so seesei no kyerɛ sɛ bere a Onyankopɔn bɛkeka ne ho no abɛn.—Kenkan 2 Timoteo 3:1-5. 3. Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ? Ɛsɛ sɛ yesua Onyankopɔn ho ade fi n’Asɛm Bible no mu. Ɛte sɛ krataa a agya bi a ɔwɔ ɔdɔ akyerɛw abrɛ yɛn. Na mma mennkɔ wɔn adidi ase. 5 Onipa pa betumi atwe m’aso aka m’anim ayamye so, nanso menhwehwɛ nnebɔneyɛfo nkyɛn anuonyam efisɛ, daa mebɔ mpae tia wɔn nneyɛe bɔne no. 6 Sɛ wɔtow wɔn ahemfo fi abotan mmepɔw so bɛhwe fam a, nnipa begye adi sɛ me nsɛm a meka no yɛ nokware. 7 Wɔte sɛ dua a wɔapae mu na wɔatwitwa mu asinasin; saa na wɔn nnompe bɛbɔ ahwete wɔ damoa ho. 8 Nanso Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, mekɔ so de me ho to wo so. Gana Ghana, ɛyɛ ɔman wɔ Abibiman. Kane no na yɛn frɛ ɔman no "Gold Coast" a ɛkyerɛ se Sika Mpoano. Na ɔno ahenkro no din de Nkran (Accra). Ghana nipa beyɛ Opepe Aduonu-baako ne akyire (over 21 million). Ghana yɛ ɔman a ɔno nyaa fawohodie kane wɔ Abibirem nyinaa wɔ Obubuo da a etɔ so Nsia, Afe Apem, Aha Nkron Aduonum Nson (6th Ɔbɛnem 1957). Ɔman panyin a odii ɔman no anim maa yɛn nyaa fawohodie no ne Osagyefoɔ (Dokta)Okunini Kwame Nkrumah. Nkuro akɛse no bi ɛne Kumasi, Oguaa (Cape Coast), Koforidua, Tema, Tamale, Sekondi (Sakune) ɛne Takorade. Kumasi yɛ Asantifoɔ ahenkuro. Asantihene, Otumifoɔ Osei Tutu a ɔtɔ so Mmienu (II) ɛne Ohenepɔn a sesei ɔte Sika Dwa Kofi (The Golden Stool) so. Ghana wɔ mantam beyɛ du. Ɔman Panyin a ɔno di Ghana so sesei no din de Nana Addo Dankwa Ekufo Addo. Ghanafoɔ pɛ asomdwoe na wɔn san yɛ nkrofoɔ a wɔn suro Nyame. Ghana yɛ ɔman a yɛn wɔ sika, ɛnam nneɛmapa a yɛn nya firi asaase no mu. Ghanafoɔ aniabue. Sesei yɛn asuaepon (university), ɛyɛ bebree.

Wopɛ sɛ wokenkan saa asɛm yi wɔ %% mu anaa? Yiw Dabi Mote Nka sɛ Mo Nko Ara na Mubenya Nkwa? Dabi. Nnipa ɔpempem pii tenaa ase mfe pii atwam ni a na wɔnyɛ Yehowa Adansefo, nanso wɔbɛdom wɔn agye wɔn nkwa. Bible ma yehu sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ bɔ sɛ wiase foforo bɛba, na sɛ ɛba a, “ wɔn a wɔteɛ ne wɔn a wɔnteɛ bɛsɔre afi awufo mu.” (Asomafo Nnwuma 24:15) Afei nso, nnipa pii wɔ hɔ nnɛ a, akyiri yi na wɔbɛba abɛsom Onyankopɔn; saafo no nso benya nkwa. Nanso sɛ obi benya nkwa oo, sɛ ɔrennya nkwa oo, ɛnyɛ yɛn na yɛbɛkyerɛ. Yesu na ɔbɛyɛ saa adwuma no.—Yohane 5:22, 27. © 2014 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania. |

Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn abɔde a odi kan, na ɔno na Onyankopɔn nko ara bɔɔ no. Enti ntease wom sɛ wɔfrɛ no Onyankopɔn Ba a ɔwoo
..........
su baa asase so? Onyankopɔn somaa Yesu sɛ ɔmmɛkyerɛ nnipa nokware no. Onyankopɔn Ahenni yɛ nniso a ɛwɔ soro a ɛde asomdwoe bɛba asase nyinaa so, na ɛno na Yesu kaa ho asɛm. Wama yɛanya anidaso sɛ yebetumi atena ase daa. (Yohane 4:14; 18:36, 37) Afei nso Yesu kyerɛɛ nea ɛbɛma nnipa anya anigye ankasa. (Mateo 5:3; 6:19-21) Yesu de ne nneyɛe kasa kyerɛɛ nkurɔfo. Ɛho nhwɛso ne sɛ ɔkyerɛɛ sɛnea yɛbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn apɛde wɔ tebea a emu yɛ den mpo mu. Bere a nkurɔfo tan n’ani no, wanyɛ bi antua ka.—Kenka

Ɔfa 4: Efi Israel Hene a Odi Kan So Besi Babilon Nnommumfa So Saul bɛyɛɛ Israel hene a odi kan. Nanso Yehowa pow no, na wɔpaw Dawid sɛ ɔhene sii n’ananmu. Yehu nneɛma pii wɔ Dawid ho. Sɛ́ aberante no, ɔne ɔbran Goliat koe. Akyiri yi oguan fii Ɔhene Saul ɔhoɔyawfo no anim. Afei Abigail a ne ho yɛ fɛ siw no kwan wɔ ade bɔne bi a anka ɔrekɔyɛ ho. Nea edi hɔ no, yesua Dawid ba Salomo a odii Dawid ade sɛ Israel hene no ho nneɛma pii. Israel ahene baasa a wodi kan no mu biara dii hene mfe 40. Salomo wu akyi no Israel mu pae bɛyɛɛ nhemman abien, kusuu fam de ne kesee fam de. Kusuu fam mmusua 10 ahemman no traa hɔ mfe 257 ansa na Asiriafo sɛee no. Mfe 133 akyi no wɔsɛee kesee fam mmusua abien ahemman no nso. Saa bere yi wɔde Israelfo no kɔɔ nnommumfa mu wɔ Babilon. Enti Ɔfa a Ɛto so ANAN yi ka mfe 510 a nsɛm a ɛyɛ nwonwa pii sisii wɔ mu mu abakɔsɛm.

Moyɛ Amerika Matew-Me-Ho Kuw Bi Anaa? Yɛn adwumayɛbea ti wɔ United States of America, nanso nea edidi so yi nti, yebetumi aka sɛ yɛnyɛ Amerika matew-me-ho kuw biara: Ebinom kyerɛ sɛ matew-me-ho kuw yɛ nkurɔfo a wɔatew wɔn ho afi ɔsom bi ho. Yehowa Adansefo antew wɔn ho amfi ɔsom biara ho. Mmom no, yegye di sɛ Kristosom a na ɛwɔ hɔ asomafo no bere so no, ɛno na yɛasan akɔfa aba. Yehowa Adansefo yɛ wɔn adwuma wɔ nsase ne aman bɛboro 230 so. Baabi a yɛte biara no, Yehowa Nyankopɔn ne Yesu Kristo na yɛdan wɔn na ɛnyɛ U.S. aban anaa aban foforo biara. —Yohane 15: 19; 17: 15, 16. Yɛde yɛn nkyerɛkyerɛ nyinaa gyina Bible so; yɛmfa yɛn nkyerɛkyerɛ nnyina asɔre panyin bi a ɔwɔ United States nsɛm so. —1 Tesalonikafo 2:13. Yenni onipa kannifo biara; Yesu ne yɛn kannifo. —Mateo 23: 8-10.

Wunim nnipa ko? Wɔn mu biako ne ɔbɔfo bɔne a wɔfrɛ no Satan Ɔbonsam no. Ɔno na otumi maa Adam ne Hawa yɛɛ Yehowa so asoɔden. Na Satan na ɔmaa Yesu atamfo yɛɛ bɔne kɛse yi. Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Sukuu atitire baako a ewo ho ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Nko animu Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wo ho.

Nwane Mɔ A Le Gyihova Alasevolɛ? Yɛvi aneɛ nee mbusua ngakyile dɔɔnwo anu, noko kɛmɔ yɛlɛ bodane ko la ati yɛha yɛbɔ nu. Mɔɔ hyia kpalɛ la, yɛkulo kɛ yɛdi Gyihova, Nyamenle ne mɔɔ manle bɛhɛlɛle Baebolo ne la nee ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti Bɔvolɛ ne eni. Yɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛbazukoa Gyisɛse Kelaese na ɔyɛ yɛ fɛ kɛ yɛle Keleseɛnema. Yɛ nuhua ko biala fa mekɛ boa awie mɔ maa bɛsukoa Baebolo ne nee Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ. Ɔluakɛ yɛka anzɛɛ yɛdi Gyihova Nyamenle nee ye Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo daselɛ la ati, bɛfɛlɛ yɛ Gyihova Alasevolɛ. Nea yɛ Intanɛte zo ɛleka ne. Kenga Baebolo ne wɔ ɛkɛ. Sukoa yɛ diedi nee yɛ nwo edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo.

Onyankopɔn Yɛ Nyame Baasakoro Anaa? Nea Bible ka Asɔre pii kyerɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ Nyame Baasakoro. Nanso Encyclopædia Britannica ka sɛ: “ Asɛm Baasakoro no ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no nyinaa nni Apam Foforo no mu . . . Akyinnyegye bebree kɔɔ so mfe pii, na ɛno na nkakrankakra ɛkɔfaa saa nkyerɛkyerɛ no bae.” Bible nka Onyankopɔn ho asɛm wɔ baabiara sɛ ɔyɛ Nyame Baasakoro. Wo de, hwɛ Bible mu nsɛm ɛdidi so yi: “Yehowa yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ Yehowa koro.” —Deuteronomium 6:4. “Wo a wo din de Yehowa no, wo nko ara ne Ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.” —Dwom 83:18. “Eyi ne daa nkwa, sɛ [wɔbɛhu] wo, nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ no, yiye, ne nea wosomaa no no, Yesu Kristo.” —Yohane 17:3. “Onyankopɔn yɛ obiako.” —Galatifo 3:20. Adɛn nti na Kristofo dodow no ara ka sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ Nyame Baasakoro? SUA PII Dɛn na Bible Kyerɛkyerɛ Ankasa?

ƆWƐN-ABAN JUNE 2014 Onyankopɔn Bu Sigaretnom Sɛn? Sɛ wuhu Onyankopɔn adwene wɔ sigaretnom ho a, ebetumi ama wagyae nom. Sigaret Redi Nnipa Awu Adɛn nti na mmɔden a nnipa abɔ nyinaa akyi, sigaret da so ara di awu? Sigaret —Onyankopɔn Bu no Sɛn? Bible nhyɛ da mmɔ sigaret anaa tawa din, enti yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ahu adwene a Onyankopɔn kura wɔ sigaret ho? Nkwa Paanoo No —Woaka Ahwɛ? Adɛn nti na Yesu kaa sɛ ɔno ne nkwa paanoo ne paanoo a efi soro? Anidaso Bɛn na Ɛwɔ Hɔ Ma Me Nananom a Wɔawuwu? Bible se Onyankopɔn benyan wɔn a wɔnteɛ mpo afi owu mu. Adɛn nti na ɔbɛyɛ saa? Tetefo Baasa a Wɔpɛɛ Nokware Akyi Kwan —Ekosii Sɛn? Biribi a Capito, Cellarius, ne Campanus nyinaa yɛe nti, Katolek Asɔre no ne nnipa a na wɔrepere ɔsom mu nsakrae ko tiaa wɔn. Bible Nsɛmmisa Ho Mmuae Nea enti a wɔbɔɔ asase no, ɛbɛba mu anaa?

Ghana Ghana yɛ kurow bi a ɛwɔ West Africa mantam hɔ. Nkurow a atwa ne ho ahyia no bi ne Côte d’Ivoire (ɛno wɔ atɔe fam), Burkina Faso (ɛno wɔ atifi fam), Togo (ɛno wɔ apue fam) ɛna Gulf of Guinea no wɔ anafo fam. Edin Ghana no kyerɛ “Ɔko mu Hene” na wonyaa saa din no fii tete Ghana empire no mu. Kan no, na ahenni ahorow na woagye Ghana asase no afa paa yiye, te sɛ Ashanti Ahenni, Akwamufo, Bonomanfo, Denkyirafo, Fantefo, ne afoforo a wɔka ho. Ebinom de, na wɔnyɛ Akan fo, te sɛ Ga ne Dagombafo. Wɔne Europafo ntam guadi fii ase bere a wɔne Portugalfo yɛ ntease apam wɔ mfe 1500 mu hɔ. Ɛno akyi no, Britainfo maa nea wɔfrɛ no Gold Coast Ahenni no fii asɛ wɔ afe 1874 mu wɔ Ghana mmeae bi pɛ. Gold Coast no nyaa fahodi wɔ afe 1957 mu fii wɔn sodifo a na wɔne United Kingdom no. ɛno ma Ghana bɛyɛɛ ɔman a edi kan wɔ abibirim ha a enyaa fahodi fii Europafo Nhyɛso ase Nkekaho[sesa] - Government of Ghana Official Website (English) - Parliament of Ghana (English)

TI BIAKO Dɛn Ne Onyankopɔn Ho Nokwasɛm? So Onyankopɔn dwen wo ho ankasa? Onyankopɔn suban te dɛn? So ɔwɔ din? So wubetumi abɛn Onyankopɔn? SO WOAHYƐ sɛnea mmofra bisa nsɛm no nsow? Wɔn mu pii fi ase sua kasa ara pɛ ná wɔrebisa nsɛm. Wɔhããhãã wɔn ani ma wɔn ti so hwɛ w’anim bisa wo nsɛm te sɛ: Dɛn nti na ewim yɛ bruu? Dɛn na wɔde yɛɛ nsoromma? Hena na ɔkyerɛɛ nnomaa sɛnea wonsu? Ebia wobɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ wubebua, nanso ɛnyɛ bere nyinaa na ɛyɛ mmerɛw. Mmuae a eye sen biara a wode bɛma no mpo bɛma wɔas
..........
ankopɔn wɔ abodin ahorow pii. “Onyankopɔn” ne “Awurade” yɛ abodin no bi. Na Bible kyerɛkyerɛ nso sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ din ankasa: Ɛne Yehowa. Dwom 83:18 ka sɛ: “Wo a wo din de Yahwe [Yehowa, NW] no, wo nko ara ne ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.” Sɛ edin no nni wo Bible mu a, ebia w’ani begye ho sɛ wobɛhwɛ Nkekaho no na woahu nea enti a ɛte saa. Nokwasɛm ne sɛ Onyankopɔn din pue mpɛn mpempem pii wɔ tete Bible nsaano nkyerɛwee no mu. Enti, Yehowa pɛ sɛ wuhu ne din na wode di dwuma. Yebetumi aka sɛ ɔnam

Kɛzi Bɛtua Bɛ Gyima Ne Anwo Kakɛ Ɛ? Yɛdua ndoboa mɔɔ Gyihova Alasevolɛ ne mɔ ye la azo a yɛtua yɛ edwɛkɛhanlɛ gyima ne anwo kakɛ a. Yɛnlielie ezukoa wɔ yɛ ayia ne mɔ abo, yɛɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ nu la ɛndua ɛkpɔ ko ngyɛnu bulu. (Mateyu 10:7, 8) Emomu, yɛfa nlɛka yɛsiezie yɛ ayia ne mɔ abo amaa awie mɔɔ ɔkulo kɛ ɔye ezukoa ɔboa la ahola ayɛ zɔ. Yɛnga menli mɔɔ ye ndoboa la yɛngile. Debie ko mɔɔ ɔti yɛmbɔ kakɛ kpole la a le kɛ yɛnlɛ ɛsɔfoma mɔɔ yɛtua bɛ kakɛ a. Bieko, yɛndua Alasevolɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛkɔka ed
..........
, yɛɛ yɛnzi ɛzonlenlɛ azua mgbole. Yɛfa ndoboa biala mɔɔ ba yɛ ɔfese ne mɔ la yɛboa menli mɔɔ esiane ɛdo bɛ, edwɛkpatɛlɛvoma nee neavolɛ adenduvoma, yɛfa bie yɛsisi azua mɔɔ yɛsonle nu wɔ maanle mɔɔ bɛnlɛ ezukoa dɔɔnwo la anu, yɛɛ yɛfa bie yɛyɛ Baebolo nee mbuluku gyɛne na yɛfa yɛkɔ maanle gyɛne zo. Awie ko biala si kpɔkɛ kɛ ɔbaye ezukoa yeamaa bɛava bɛadua kakɛ mɔɔ ye asafo ne bɔ, anzɛɛ kakɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ ye yɛ ewiade amuala gyima ne anwo anzɛɛ ɔ mu nwiɔ. Asafo biala bu ezukoa mɔɔ ɔdie la anwo mgbon

ESUADZE 19 Woana Nye Akowaa Nokwafo nye Nyansafo No? Aka ber tsiabaa bi ma Jesus ewu no, ɔnye n’esuafo no mu baanan twetwẽe nsumaa mu nkɔmbɔ bi. Esuafo no nye; Peter, James, John nye Andrew. Aber a nna Jesus rekã ne mbae wɔ ewiei mber mu no ho asɛnkyerɛdze ho asɛm no, obisaa asɛm a no ho hia yi dɛ; “Woana mbɔ nye akowaa nokwafo nye nyansafo a no wura dze no esi ne fikuw do, dɛ ɔmma hɔn edziban wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu?” (Matthew 24:3, 45; Mark 13:3, 4) Nna Jesus rema n’esuafo no awerɛhyɛmu dɛ, dɛ hɔn “wu
..........
ɛn wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu.’ Ɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn fie no do. (1 Timothy 3:15) Jesus dze asodzi a no mu yɛ dur hyɛɛ akowaa no nsa dɛ ɔnhwɛ edwuma a Jehovah ahyehyɛdze no ne fã a ɔwɔ asaase do no reyɛ no do. Ɔno na ɔhwɛ ndzɛmba a hɛn ahyehyɛdze no wɔ no do, ɔkyerɛ asɛnka edwuma no kwan, na ɔnam hɛn asafo ahorow no do kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn. Ntsi mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma “akowaa nokwafo nye nyansafo” yi ama hɛn dza yehia wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu no, ɔnam nwoma nye dza ɔkã ho ahorow a yɛdze yɛ asɛnka edwuma no, nye dwumadzi ahorow a ɔkɔ do

Woesisi Ahendzi Asa Ahorow 3,000 Ewie Wɔ Nigeria Memenda, March 1, 2014 no, nyimpadɔm bi a hɔn enyi agye a hɔn dodow si 823 behyiaa mu wɔ Jehovah Adasefo Ehyiadzi Asa a ɔwɔ Nigeria kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Benin City no mu dze bɛkyerɛɛ hɔn enyigye wɔ nkɔenyim soronko bi a woenya no ho. Ofitsi aber a nhyehyɛɛ a wɔayɛ dze sisi Ahendzi Asa ahorow wɔ aman a wonnyaa mpontu pii mu no hyɛɛ ase wɔ afe 1999 mu no, Jehovah Adasefo esisi Ahendzi Asa ahorow 3,000 wɔ dɛm man no mu. Wɔdaa edwumadzen a wɔayɛ wɔ Nig

Ɔdze bodur afe 1997 mu no, nna Ɔmantɔw Adansi Egyinatukuw no aboa asafo ahorow 105 ma woesisi anaa woesiesie hɔn Ahendzi Asa ahorow. Wɔ afe 1997 besi 1999 mu no, wosisii asa ahorow 13 a no mu biara no wɔdze nda 7 kesi 15 wiee si. Adansi edwuma a wɔyɛɛ no ntsɛntsɛm yi nyinara mpo enntum enndzi mbrɛ Jehovah Adasefo no dodow rinya nkɔenyim wɔ Nigeria man mu no ehiadze ho dwuma. Wɔ April 1998 mu no, edwumayɛbea nkorbata no buu akontaa dɛ wohia Ahendzi Asa ahorow 1,114 wɔ man no mu. Aber a Don Trost,

Muyi Ntotoso Du Du Anaa? Dabi, Yehowa Adansefo nyi ntotoso du du; sika a yɛde yɛ yɛn adwuma no, nkurɔfo yi wɔn yam yi a wɔnyɛ ho dede biara. Dɛn ne ntotoso du du, na adɛn nti na Yehowa Adansefo nyi bi? Mmara a ɛka sɛ obi nyi ntotoso du du anaa ɔmfa nea ɔwɔ mu abupɛn du mu biako mmra no, ɛka Mmara a wɔde maa tete Israel man no ho. Nanso Bible ma emu da hɔ fann sɛ Kristofo nhyɛ saa Mmara no ase, enti ‘ahyɛde a ese wonnye ntotoso du du’ no nyɛ adwuma bio. Yehowa Adansefo nyi ntotoso du du, na wontwaa biribiara mmaa wɔn sɛ wɔmfa mmɔ afɔre; mmom no yesuasua tete Kristofo no, na akwan abien na yɛfa so boa ɔsom adwuma no: yɛyɛ ɔsom adwuma no a, yennye ho sika na afei nso yeyi ntoboa de boa adwuma no. Saa a yɛyɛ no kyerɛ sɛ yɛde afotu a Bible de ma Kristofo yi reyɛ adwuma: “Obiara nyɛ no sɛnea wasusuw wɔ ne komam, ɛnyɛ amemenemfe anaa ɔhyɛ so, efisɛ Onyankopɔn dɔ nea ɔtew n’anim ma.”

Yehuu sɛ wusiw fi ntokuru bi mu reba, na ogya tɔɔ yɛn ɔfese a ɛyɛ abansoro tenteenten no mu.”—Joshua. Asasewosow, mframa gyampantrudu, topae a nsɛmmɔnedifo tow, sukuufo a wɔtotow tuo bɔ wɔn. Weinom yɛ nsɛm a yɛtaa te wɔ kaseɛbɔ mu paa. Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, ɛsono sɛ worekenkan atoyerɛnkyɛm ho ade, ɛnna ɛsono sɛ ebi ato wo. Sɛ atoyerɛnkyɛm si na wubetumi anya wo ti adidi mu a, ɛnde d
..........
ɔhyɛ baabi a mframa no renka wo. Bere a nsuyiri bi asi. Ɔdan biara a nsu akɔ mu no, pue fi mu. Nnantew nsu biara mu, na mfa kar nso mfa mu. Sɛ nsu yiri a, etumi fa bɔla, na nneɛma bi nso wom a ebetumi apira wo. Ebi ne nneɛma a abubu, amena bi a ɛso da hɔ, ne elɛtrik nhama a atetew. So wunim? Sɛ nsu retene, na emu dɔ bɛyɛ mita 0.6 a, ebetumi apia kar akɔ. Nea enti a nnipa bebree wu wɔ nsuyiri mu ne sɛ, wɔde wɔn kar fa nsu a ayiri no mu. Aduane Aduane yɛ biribiara a wodi[1] ma ɛma nipadua no nya ahoɔden. Mpɛn pii no, yɛnya saa aduane no fi dua bi anaa aboa bi mu, na ahoɔdennuru pii wo mu. Saa aduane no, sɛ wodi a, na ɛkɔ nipadua no mu a, na wo nipadua no atwetwe mu nsu no, na ɛno na ɛma wonya wo nkwammoa a ɛwɔ honam no mu na ahoɔden, na wo nkwa no tumi kɔ so yɛ nea ɛwɔ sɛ ɛyɛ na etumi nyin nso. Efi abakɔsɛm mu no, nnipa nya aduane denam akwan mmienu so: Wokyin hwehwɛ na woaboa ano, anaa denam kuayɛ so. Nnɛ, kuayɛ adwuma no na ɛde aduane a nnipa pii hia no de ma wɔn. Aduane a nnipa benya adi no yɛ onipa biara hokwan, a International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights (ICESCR) no gye tom sɛ, "ɛyɛ hokwan sɛ obi benya asetena pa, a aduane pa ka ho," na afei, "ɔwɔ hokwan sɛ ɔkɔm rende no."
